sys_script_include.description: Script inlcude to return an employee ID. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a user table record.
sys_script_include.name: GetEmployeeID

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_775151c42fd349108f2cd4a72799b601
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_746768_metrotime.GetEmployeeID</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script inlcude to return an employee ID. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a user table record.</description><name>GetEmployeeID</name><script><![CDATA[var GetEmployeeID = Class.create();
GetEmployeeID.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getUserInformation: function(){
		var result = {};
		result.employee_id = "";
		result.employee_name = "";
		result.employee_id = "";
		result.employee_number = "";
		result.manager_id = "";
		result.manager_name = "";
		result.manager_id = "";
		result.manager_number = "";

		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		if (gr.get(this.getParameter("sysparm_user_id"))){
			result.employee_id = gr.u_employee_name.toString();
			result.employee_name = gr.u_employee_name.getDisplayValue();
			result.employee_id = gr.u_employee_name.u_emp_id.toString();
			result.employee_number = gr.u_employee_name.u_emp_id.getDisplayValue();
			result.manager_id= gr.u_employee_name.u_manager_name.toString();
			result.manager_name = gr.u_employee_name.u_manager_name.getDisplayValue();
			result.manager_id = gr.u_employee_name.u_manager_id.toString();
			result.manager_number = gr.u_employee_name.u_manager_id.getDisplayValue();
		}
		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},
    type: 'GetEmployeeID'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-01 15:53:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>775151c42fd349108f2cd4a72799b601</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmployeeID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MetroTime" source="x_746768_metrotime">5f75a4e52f0701108f2cd4a72799b60e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MetroTime">5f75a4e52f0701108f2cd4a72799b60e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_775151c42fd349108f2cd4a72799b601</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-01 16:05:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
